data.name: Rush
data.description: Gain 25% increased movement speed for 5 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second for every 50 action points you had. You become exerted losing all of your action points, career mechanic points, and morale. Your AP recovery and morale per second are set to 0 for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Grants a 300 unique bonus to elemental resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional X spiritual damage over 3 seconds. This damage scales with strength, intelligence, and ballistic skill.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Gain 10% parry strikethrough, 10% dodge strikethrough, and 10% disrupt strikethrough.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Remove up to 10 ailments, curses, or hexes from your groupmates within 100 feet. Restore 300 health for each health removed from the target.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will heal your target for 1200 + (0.8 WIL). This ability is not effected by healing debuffs.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Apotheosis
data.description: Each time Healing Energy ticks, there is a 33% chance to apply Blessing of Isha to the target.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50% and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: Siphon the winds of magic into your body gaining 15 stacks that last for 30 seconds. You gain a 40 morale bonus to intelligence for each stack. Everytime you use an ability, a stack is consumed and you gain 10 action points.

data.name: Arcane Suppression
data.description: Knockback up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you. For the next 8s, their movement speed is decreased by 50% and they cannot activate snarebreaking abilities.

data.name: Arcing Power
data.description: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, your defensive target will become healed for 25% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Balance Essence
data.description: This ability will always consume Force or Tranquility. If cast with Force, it will deal X spiritual damage to the target and heal your defensive target for 250% of the damage dealt. If cast with Tranquility, it will deal X spiritual damage to the target, healing your target for Y health plus 100% of the damage done.

data.name: Blessing of Isha
data.description: Heals all groupmates within 100 feet for X plus another Y over 6 seconds.

data.name: Blinding Light
data.description: For 5 seconds, your target and up to 9 other enemies within 20 feet of them will take an additional 1 second to build up all abilities.

data.name: Bolstering Rains
data.description: Rain Lord will now also grant 10 morale per second for 10 seconds to all groupmates within 100 feet of the target.

data.name: Boon of Hysh
data.description: Heals your target for X health. Heals them for an additional Y for each Lambent Aura, Healing Energy, and Blessing of Isha on the target.

data.name: Changing Winds
data.description: Law of Age and Reclaim magic now have a 30 second cooldown.

data.name: Cleansing Light
data.note:
Target must be cursed or ailing
Force removes cooldown
Builds Tranquility
data.description: You cleanse an ally's wound and remove one ailment or curse. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to X damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Desperation
data.description: Your outgoing healing is 25% more effective when the target is below 40% hit points.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Dispel Magic
data.description: Fury of Asuryan will now deal additional spiritual damage and always remove 1 blessing from the target.

data.name: Dissipating Energies
data.description: Target becomes surrounded by dangerous energies for 5 seconds. Every second, target and up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of them will suffer X spiritual damage.

data.name: Dissipating Hatred
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Empowered Lores
data.description: Whenever an ability consumes either Force or Tranquility, its action point cost will be reduced by 60% and it can be cast while moving.

data.name: Energy of Vaul
data.description: This ability will always consume Force or Tranquility. If cast with Force, deal X spiritual damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of target. You will heal each groupmate within 100 feet for Y + 50% of total damage dealt. If cast with Tranquility, deal X spiritual damage to up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of target. Heal up to 6 allies within 30 feet of the target and all groupmates within 100 feet for Y + 50% of total damage dealt.

data.name: Flames of the Phoenix
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your target will take (225 + 0.2 INT) spiritual damage each time an enemy tries to dispel them or whenever they take damage from Law of Conductivity and Radiant Gaze. In addition, dispels will not function when used on the target; this does not affect morales.

data.name: Funnel Energy
data.description: Target enemy and up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of them have their action point costs increased by 100% for 15 seconds. During this time, your groupmates within 100 feet have their costs decreased by 50%.

data.name: Funnel Essence
data.description:
You focus your powers on your defensive target, restoring up to X health to them over 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or if you run out of action points.

This ability will trigger a 10 second buff on the target for use with Isha's Denial.

data.name: Fury of Asuryan
data.description: Calls forth the wrath of Asuryan in the form of a pillar of magical energy, dealing X spiritual damage to your target.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health. For the next 45 seconds, the target will be afflicted with Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Golden Aura
data.description: Shield of Saphery will now grant the target 15% additional damage while active, but the cooldown is increased to 20 seconds.

data.name: Healing Energy
data.description: Your target regains X health immediately, then continues to gain another Y health over 10 seconds.

data.name: Hurried Restore
data.description: Gift Of Life now resurrects allies instantly, but stuns you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Isha's Denial
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain Isha's Denial for 60 minutes. All healing over time effects you cast on targets affected by Isha's Denial will grant a 2% reduced chance to be critically hit.

data.name: Isha's Encouragement
data.description: If Cleansing Light successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain X health over 5 seconds.

data.name: Isha's Ward
data.description: Remove all healing debuffs from the target and make them immune to healing debuffs for 10 seconds.

data.name: Lambent Aura
data.description: Heals your target for X health over 20 seconds.

data.name: Law of Age
data.description: If you have 5 stacks of Tranquility, you will now have 5 stacks of Force. If you have 5 stacks of Force, you will now have 5 stacks of Tranquilty. Shares a cooldown with Reclaim Magic.

data.name: Law of Conductivity
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Law of Gold
data.description: Deals X spirit damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Magical Infusion
data.description:
Infuses protective magic into an ally for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near-fatal wounds.

If the ally's health is reduced below 30%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore X health if they are still alive. As long as this effect persists, the value of incoming heals on the target is increased by 25%.

data.name: Master of Balance
data.description: Gain 10% magic critical chance and 10% healing critical chance.

data.name: Mistress of The Marsh
data.description: For 10 seconds, up to 9 enemies within 20 feet of a spot that you select will take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to initiative and become snared, reducing their run speed by 50%.

data.name: Prismatic Shield
data.description:
Everyone in your group within 100 feet gains a (7.5 * rank) ability bonus to all resistances for 1 hour.

You can only give Isha's Denial or Prismatic Shield.

data.name: Radiant Burst
data.description: Radiant Lance and Radiant Gaze will now effect up to 9 enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Radiant Gaze
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage over 15 seconds and reduces your target's damage and chance to critically hit by 5%.

data.name: Radiant Lance
data.description: A lance of brilliant energy erupts from your staff, dealing X spiritual damage to your target.

data.name: Rain Lord
data.description: Your target and up to 9 other enemies within 20 feet of them take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength, intelligence, and ballistic skill for 20 seconds.

data.name: Reclaim Magic
data.description: You employ your mastery of High Magic to gain 180 action points over 10 seconds. You will be unable to generate Force or Tranquility for the duration. Shares a cooldown with Law of Age.

data.name: Run Between Worlds
data.description: Reduces the cooldown time for Walk Between Worlds by 50%.

data.name: Scatter The Winds
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage to your target over 10 seconds, and causes all heals that they receive to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Scorching Touch
data.description:
Reduces the duration and tick interval of Searing Touch by 50%. Radiant Lance will now deal an additional X spirit damage to the target over 5 seconds.

You can no longer use Cleansing Light, Walk Between Worlds, or Gift of Life.

data.name: Searing Touch
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing X spiritual damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Shield of Saphery
data.description: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier for up to 9 seconds which will absorb up to X damage.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 300 raw damage per tick for 3 ticks over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Storm of Cronos
data.description: A field of energy strikes the target and enemies within 20 feet of them, dealing X spiritual damage and causing them to take a Y ability penalty to spirit resistance for 20 seconds.

data.name: Tranquil Presence
data.description: Applies Healing Energy, Lambent Aura, and Blessing of Isha to all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Transfer Force
data.description: Deals X spiritual damage to your target over 24 seconds and heals your groupmates for 50% of the damage done on each tick.

data.name: Transfer Magic
data.description:
Isha's Denial will cause groupmates to gain 10 action points anytime they are hit with a direct damage attack. You will gain 5 action points each time this happens and can only happen once per second per groupmate.

Removing this tactic will dispel Isha's Denial from your group.

data.name: Walk Between Worlds
data.description: You can not be set back for 5 seconds and detaunts all enemies around you, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal to you to 50%.

data.name: Wild Healing
data.description: Your Lambent Aura, Healing Energy, and Blessing of Isha now all gain 1 additional tick of healing.

data.name: Wind Blast
data.description: You call forth a powerful gust of wind which slams into enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking players away a medium distance and knocking monsters down. Anyone hit by the wind becomes snared, reducing their run speed by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Winds' Protection
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet regain 800 health over 15 seconds, and become surrounded by a magical barrier which will absorb 2400 damage.
